DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy brimonidine 0.2 % /timolol 0.5 % fix combination ophthalmic solution compare concurrent brimonidine 0.2 % timolol ophthalmic solution
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study Brimonidine/Timolol Fixed Combination Patients With Glaucoma Ocular Hypertension
